definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
lit. count by fives and tens (idiom); to narrate systematically and in full detail

sentences.english: Will the Chinese Government allow this kind of protest during the May Day?
sentences.chinese: 中國政府是否允許“五一”期間發生這類抗議活動？

sentences.english: May Day is the International Labor Day.
He told his boss the whole story exactly as it had happened.
sentences.chinese: 他把事情一五一十地都給他的上司講了。

sentences.english: Right now , it become a veritable garden school. It was surrounded with trees , tidy and pretty.
sentences.chinese: 如今的五一小學已成爲一所名副其實的花園式學校。

sentences.english: No, not yet. But I plan to go to Singapore this May Day.
sentences.chinese: 沒有，但是我打算這個五一節去新加坡。

sentences.english: First day of music tour, countryside of Guizhou Province.
sentences.chinese: 採風第一天，貴州五一寨農田。

sentences.english: This May Day holiday, my friend and I went to climb the famous Wuyi mountain.
sentences.chinese: 今年五一，我和朋友去聞名遐邇的武夷山玩。

sentences.english: He told his wife about the matter without hiding anything.
sentences.chinese: 他把事情一五一十都給妻子講了。

sentences.english: A mobile fruit vendor at a night market in Urumqi.
sentences.chinese: 烏市的五一夜市有流動的水果小販。

sentences.english: Experience the authentic & creative delicacies with an incomparable dining experience during May Day holiday.
sentences.chinese: “飛”常五一假期，體驗非一般的美食新感受。

sentences.english: China has canceled week-long May Day holidays.
sentences.chinese: 中國取消爲期一週的五一假期。

sentences.english: On May Day my classmates and I went to the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 五一節那天，我和我的同學一起去登長城。

sentences.english: By next May Day we shall have been together for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 到下一個五一節，我們在一起的時間就很長了。

sentences.english: Thousands of people come to Beijing for a visit during May Day.
sentences.chinese: 五一國際勞動節期間，數以千計的人來北京參觀。

sentences.english: This afternoon I joined in the English Corner at the Wuyi Square.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我參加了五一廣場的英語角活動。

sentences.english: QQ details plus two hundred fifty-seven thousand two hundred fifty-one dwell.
sentences.chinese: 具體內容加QQ二五七二五一詳談。

definition: the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month
the Mid-autumn festival, the traditional moon-viewing festival on the 15th of the 8th lunar month
Qingming or Pure Brightness Festival or Tomb Sweeping Day, celebration for the dead (in early April)
Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
Golden Week, two 7-day national holiday periods
to have a holiday or vacation
